title: British antiquities revived, or, A friendly contest touching the soveraignty of the three princes of VVales in ancient times managed with certain arguments whereunto answers are applyed by Robert Vaughan, Esq. ; to which is added the pedigree of the Right Honourable the Earl of Carbery, Lord President of Wales ; with a short account of the five royall tribes of Cambria, by the same author.
author: Vaughan, Robert, 1592-1667.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Hen. Hall ... for Thomas Robinson,
